welcome:
👋 *Welcome to Produkt Bot!*

I'm here to help you manage events and check sales data.

Type *register* to get started or *help* for more information.
welcomeUnregistered:
🎉 *Welcome to Produkt App - Chat Bot*

You are not registered yet!

To begin the process, type: *register*
If you need help, type: *help*
unknownCommand:
❓ *Unknown Command*

I don't recognize "{{command}}".
Type *help* to see available commands.
accessDenied:
❌ *Access Denied*

You don't have permission to use this command.

Type *help* to see your available commands.
userGreeting:
👋 Hello {{username}}!

I don't recognize "{{text}}".
Type *help* to see what I can do for you.
guestGreeting:
👋 Hello!

Type *register* to get started or *help* for more information.
technicalIssue:
⚠️ *Technical Issue*

Something went wrong on our end. Please try again in a few moments.
maintenanceMode:
🔧 *Maintenance Mode*

The bot is currently undergoing maintenance. Please try again later.
rateLimitExceeded:
⚠️ *Slow Down*

You're sending messages too quickly. Please wait a moment before trying again.
globalRateLimit:
⚠️ *Service Temporarily Busy*

Please try again in a moment.
